column5: Townhome in downtown Bryan available for gameday weekends. Located less than 0.5 miles from the A&M gameday shuttles, walking distance to the bars and restaurants of downtown Bryan.  Can easily sleep eight or more: two bedrooms, one office / extra bedroom, and living room. Sheets, towels, pillows, etc. will be provided. Home also has kitchen, garage, and ample street parking.  Flexible check-in times available, depending on what time you plan to get to town.
